desc: Passive: Bash - Grants each attack a chance to stun the target for 1.4 seconds and deal 60 bonus damage, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.
notes:
Does not stack with other sources of Bash, however it will stack with Mini-Bash (e.g. Monkey King Bar).
The following heroes cannot trigger Bash on this item: Spirit Breaker, Faceless Void, Slardar, and Troll Warlord.
attrib:
+ 25 Damage
+ 8 Strength
BASH MELEE CHANCE: 25%
BASH RANGED CHANCE: 10%
BASH STUN DURATION: 1.4
BASH BONUS DAMAGE: 60
lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.
